Definition.WordDefinition: Warrior, AL (city, FIPS 79944) Location: 33.81391 N, 86.80820 W Population (1990): 3280 (1330 housing units) Area: 15.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 35180

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Warrior \War"rior\ (?; 277), n. [OE. werreour, OF. werreour, guerreor, from guerre, werre, war. See {War}, and {Warray}.] A man engaged or experienced in war, or in the military life; a soldier; a champion. [1913 Webster]
Warriors old with ordered spear and shield. --Milton. [1913 Webster]
{Warrior ant} (Zo["o]l.), a reddish ant ({Formica sanguinea}) native of Europe and America. It is one of the species which move in armies to capture and enslave other ants. [1913 Webster]
warrior n : someone engaged in or experienced in warfare
